---
node_id: 1009
title: Transcription to Node Mapping Feature (1009)
---
### A feature to map transcribed text tokens to their corresponding Cytoscape nodes.

The feature is to create a map from transcription, where the transcribed text tokens have a map to the nodes that they now appear in. This means one node is a map from transcribed text to a Cytoscape node.
